amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for environmental management and compliance information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4798 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4798 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Isakson. (consideration: CR S8599; text: CR S8599) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for environmental management and compliance information.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4798 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4798 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Isakson.
